comments: In binary expansion, 1-bits occur only in groups of two or more, separated from other such groups by at least two 0-bits.Integers that satisfy A048727(n) = 3*n.
links: Index entries for sequences defined by congruent products between domains N and GF(2)[X]
crossrefs: Row 3 of A115872. Superset of A048719. Cf. A048733.
author: Antti Karttunen, 30.3.1999
